Synopsys | Senior R&D Engineer | Marlboro, MA | full-time, www.synopsys.com

The ZeBu emulation team part of Verification Group is hiring C++ engineers with a taste for complex challenges: scaling algorithms (we compile largest designs in the world), data-structures, heuristics, multi-threading. A bonus for some digital EE knowledge, but that's not a requirement (at all). Salary is one from a big EDA company, growth of the business unit opens up nice possibilities for personal career.

Come join a 25-year old company which stock jumped +60% in past 6 months, and create significant impact into emulation market !

Send your resume to elepercq@synopsys.com More info on ZeBu: https://www.synopsys.com/verification/emulation.html
